program agc037_e

implicit none

integer, parameter :: MAX_LEN = 100000

CHARACTER(LEN=MAX_LEN) :: S, t, sDash, revU, final_out

CHARACTER(len=2*MAX_LEN) :: temp_str

integer :: N, K, step =1, K_original, i, j

logical :: firstTime = .true.

!

character(LEN=100000) :: output_str

!

read*, N, K

read*, S 

S = adjustl(S) 
! In case leading spaces are read.

! So cut S to exact length N? 

S = S(1:N )

!

! Loop

loop_K: do while ( K >0 )

   t = reverse_char(S)

   temp_str = S // t 

   revU = reverse_char( temp_str )

   sDash = S 

   !

   do_i: do i = N, 0, -step

      integer :: start1, len_val = N 

      start1 = i +1 

      if( start1 + len_val -1 > len(revU) ) exit do_i 

      CHARACTER(LEN=len_val) :: tmp_str 

      tmp_str = revU( start1 : start1 + len_val -1 )

      if( sDash .gt. tmp_str ) then 

          sDash = tmp_str 

      else 

          if( .not. firstTime ) then 

              exit do_i 

          end if 

      end if 

   end do do_i 

   !

   if( firstTime ) then 

       firstTime = .false.

       K_original = K 

       if( (2_8**K_original) > N ) then 

           ! Need to print N copies of sDash(1:1) 

           output_str = repeat_char( sDash(1:1), N )

           write(*,'(A)') output_str 

           stop 

       end if 

   else 

       step = step *2 

   end if 

   K = K-1 

   S = reverse_char(sDash) 

end do loop_K 

!

! Final output 

write(*,'(A)')  reverse_char(S) 

contains 

   character(len=*) function reverse_char(s) 

   character(len=*), intent(in) :: s

   integer :: i, n 

   n = len(s)

   reverse_char = '' 

   do i =1, n 

      reverse_char(i:i) = s(n -i +1 :n -i +1 ) 

   end do 

   end function 

 

   function repeat_char(c, n) result(res) 

   character(len=1), intent(in) :: c

   integer, intent(in) :: n 

   character(len=n) :: res 

   integer :: i 

   do i = 1, n 

      res(i:i) = c 

   end do
